column2: simdata <- with(gvb_sect_df, data.frame(DMsmntHt = rep(seq(from=5.5,to=23.5,length.out=100),10), Symptoms=rep(factor(c("0","1"), labels = c("absent","present")),each=500), Species = rep(factor(c("Q_rubra", "Q_palustris", "Q_velutina", "Q_alba", "Q_bicolor"), labels = c("red oak", "pin oak", "black oak", "white oak", "swamp white oak")),times=2,each=100)))
# Panel by trees with and without symptoms
ggplot(simout, aes(x = DMsmntHt, y = PredictedProb)) + geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = LL,
ymax = UL, fill = Species,), alpha = 0.2) + geom_line(aes(colour = Species), size = 1) +
ylab("Probability of decay") + xlab("Trunk diameter at measurement height (cm)") +
